description: This file defines a React functional component named 'SettingsScreen' for a React Native app, providing UI for game settings such as first player choice and preferences like sound, haptics, and animations. It uses various custom components and theme styling, and interacts with a context for state management.

methods.name: SettingsScreen
methods.description: React functional component rendering game settings UI, including first player toggle and general preferences, utilizing hooks and custom components.
